@荷兰人

  • 四
  • 五

一

Squat 3x8
Leg press
Leg extensions
Single arm dumbbell rows downstairs
Dragon flags

汉字
1. Squat:
深蹲 (shēn dūn)
- 深 (shēn) - Deep
- 蹲 (dūn) - Squat

2. Leg press:
腿部推举 (tuǐ bù tuī jǔ)
- 腿部 (tuǐ bù) - Legs
- 推举 (tuī jǔ) - Push and lift

3. Leg extensions:
腿部伸展 (tuǐ bù shēn zhǎn)
- 腿部 (tuǐ bù) - Legs
- 伸展 (shēn zhǎn) - Extend and stretch

4. Single arm cable rows:
单臂拉力器划船 (dān bì lā lì qì huá chuán)
- 单臂 (dān bì) - Single arm
- 拉力器 (lā lì qì) - Cable machine
(哑铃 (yǎ líng) - Dumbbell)
- 划船 (huá chuán) - Rowing

5. Dragon flag:
龙旗 (lóng qí)
- 龙 (lóng) - Dragon
- 旗 (qí) - Flag (in this context, referring to a gymnastics move where the body is held straight and horizontal while supported by the hands on a pole or other apparatus)
一
Week I
Squat 120kg 5x8
Leg press 100kg 2x15
Leg extensions 25kg 2x12
Single arm dumbbell rows downstairs 35kg 2x10
Dragon flags 2x8

二

Bench
Larssen press
Dumbbell press
Military press
Reverse flyes
T-bar rows
Pullups
Arms superset: Ez bar skullcrushers + Ez bar bicep curl
wide small wide small

汉字
1. Bench press:
仰卧推举 (yǎng wò tuī jǔ)
-仰卧 (yǎng wò) - Lying face up
-推举 (tuī jǔ) - Push and lift

2. Larssen press:
拉森卧推 (lā sēn wò tuī)
-拉森 (lā sēn) - Larssen
-推 (tuī) - Push

3. Dumbbell press:
哑铃推 (yǎ líng tuī)
-哑铃 (yǎ líng) - Dumbbell
-推 (tuī) - Push

4. Barbell press:
杠铃推举 (gàng líng tuī jǔ)
-杠铃 (gàng líng) - Barbell
-推举 (tuī jǔ) - Push and lift

5. Reverse flyes:
反向飞鸟 (fǎn xiàng fēi niǎo)
-反向 (fǎn xiàng) - Reverse
-飞鸟 (fēi niǎo) - Flying bird

6. T-bar rows:
T杠划船 (T gàng huá chuán)
-T杠 (T gàng) - T-bar
-划船 (huá chuán) - Rowing

7. Pullups:
引体向上 (yǐn tǐ xiàng shàng)
-引体 (yǐn tǐ) - Pull body
-向上 (xiàng shàng) - Upward

8. Arms superset:
上臂超级组合： (shàng bì chāo jí zǔ hé:)
-上臂 (shàng bì) - Upper arms
-超级组合 (chāo jí zǔ hé) - Superset
Ez bar skullcrushers + Ez bar bicep curl
弯杠颈后臂屈伸＋弯杠弯举 (wān gàng jǐng hòu bì qū shén + wān gàng wān jǔ)
-弯杠 (wān gàng) - Ez bar
-颈后臂屈伸 (jǐng hòu bì qū shén) - Skullcrushers
-弯举 (wān jǔ) - Bicep curl
注意顺序 (zhù yì shùn xù) - Note the order
宽小宽小 (kuān xiǎo kuān xiǎo) - Wide small wide small (referring to the grip on the bar)

三

Deadlift (paused) Deadlift (block) Seated leg curls Hanging leg raises Bent over row

四

Squat 5x5 Squat ssb squat 2x10 Back raises/ extension Calf raises

五

Bench 5x5 Bench (elastic bands) 2x10 Dumbbell press 2x8 Military press 2x10 Lat pulldown downstairs Hammer grip pullups Side raises Arms superset: Tricep rope + bicep rope Arms superset: Tricep wide + bicep wide Abs
